title: 如何让地皮世界永久不刷怪
author: liufangpengqq

replies.author: a1457370814
replies.txt_content: 关掉生成动物/mv modify set animals false 世界名 关掉生成怪物/mv modify set monsters false 世界名

replies.author: yixiazi
replies.txt_content: 去到地皮世界，然后输入/mv modify set difficulty 0

replies.author: ColorsWind
replies.txt_content: 在那个世界输入/gamerule doMobSpawn false

replies.author: liufangpengqq
replies.txt_content:
a1457370814 发表于 2015-7-22 21:19
关掉生成动物/mv modify set animals false 世界名 关掉生成怪物/mv modify set monsters false 世界名 ...
永久的么？

replies.author: liufangpengqq
replies.txt_content:
liufangpengqq 发表于 2015-7-23 07:42
永久的么？
不刷怪了,谢谢

replies.author: a1457370814
replies.txt_content:
liufangpengqq 发表于 2015-7-23 08:51
不刷怪了,谢谢
助人为乐应该的。

replies.author: liufangpengqq
replies.txt_content:
a1457370814 发表于 2015-7-23 08:58
助人为乐应该的。
但是这个命令好像有些BUG,玩家箱子里面的东西会不见
